name: Johnny Franck
description: '''John''' "'''Johnny'''" '''Franck''' (born June 8, 1990), also known as '''Bilmuri''', is an American singer-songwriter, musician and producer. He is best known as the former clean vocalist and rhythm guitarist of [[Attack Attack! (American band)|Attack Attack!]]. He departed the band in 2010, and formed a new group called The March Ahead. In 2016, he began a new musical project under the name Bilmuri. Franck has also produced music for artists such as [[Dave Days]] and [[Jarrod Alonge]].
